properties.description: All of the ingredients are shipped to the factory, where they are made into gummy bears!! Gummy bears first came from Germany, and now the main Haribo factory is in Germany.
properties.title: Haribo Factory

properties.description: It takes a lot of fuel to get coconut oil to the Haribo factory.
properties.title: Coconut Oil to Haribo Factory

properties.description: After the gummy bears are shipped from the factory to the distribution center, the tiny gelatin bears take a long plane ride from Maryland to Colorado.
properties.title: Distribution Center to Me!
Haribo Factory to Distribution Center
properties.description: The gummy bears are shipped to the distribution center in Maryland, after they have been made.

The supply chain is the process that a product goes through to get to the consumer at the end. Throughout the process of researching the supply chain of gummy bears, I was surprised to learn how many ingredients from all over the world are shipped to the factory, then to the distribution center, then to Denver CO. It made me realize how much fuel is used just to get one item to me, and all of the things that companies could do to be better to the environment. One idea I have is to make the distribution center and the factory in the same place so that the product doesn't have to be shipped halfway around the world from the factory to the distribution center.  
Created by Mackenzie
properties.title: How Gummy Bears Get to Me!
